title: Science Subject Oral Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Program emphasizing oral communication skill enhancement through blended methodologies and classroom interaction analysis, incorporating real-time feedback via personal devices and an EVALOE scale-based interaction evaluation system

learning_goals: Mastery of oral presentation skills for clearly conveying science curriculum content
Development of effective questioning and response strategies through classroom interaction analysis
Cultivation of self-reflection abilities in oral communication through peer feedback and instructor evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
